title: 2 Times S or S- Rating And Still No Token
body:
Hi Riot and Readers!

I have scored an S rating and then an S- rating (just then) for Garen and I have had him at level 5 for a while now and I still have no tokens for him. How come? 

Thank you :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Was this in a featured gamemode? These do not award mastery tokens unfortunately.
Ahhhh okay not in featured games modes... Problem solved haha. Thank you!
Im in a similar boat, and its annoying the crap out of me!
